title: Live in style! Luxurious 2 bed, 2.5 bath in Stone Mountain
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', 'Please call', 'Location:', '1900 Tree Mountain Pkwy Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Unit for Rent:', '2-BR 2.5-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '1354 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '➢ Activity Court', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Conference Room', '➢ On-Site Maintenance', '➢ Outdoor Fireplace', '➢ Planned Community Activities', '➢', 'Pool/Clubhouse Wi-Fi', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Walk to Bus Line', '➢ Workout Center', '➢ Cardio & Fitness Center', '➢ Fax/Copy Services', '➢ Green and Flowered Areas', '➢ On-Site Management', '➢ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '➢ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '➢ Some Architectural Distinction', '➢ Three Clothes Care Centers', '➢ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', '➢', 'Well Maintained Grounds', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Carpet', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Island Kitchens', '➢ Patio/Balcony', '➢ Range w/Oven', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Sunrooms', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Custom Cabinetry', '➢ Hardwood Flooring', '➢ Individual Climate Control', '➢ Newly Renovated Apartments', '➢ Roommate Floor Plans', '➢ Townhomes Available', '➢ Trash Compactor', '➢ Washer & Dryer Connections', '➢ Window Coverings', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by The Park at East Ponce Apartments and see why our residents love to call us home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'Pet Policy:', 'We welcome your pets for a maximum of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300.', '$15 Monthly Pet Fee.', 'Weight limit is 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'The Park At East Ponce:', 'show contact info', 'Admin Fee: $135 - Non-Refundable', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '67DFEC1A07C44FB']
